metadata.name: LSASS Process Reconnaissance Via Findstr.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects findstring commands that include the keyword lsass, which indicates recon actviity for the LSASS process PID

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND ((endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\find.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\findstr.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('find\.exe', 'findstr\.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('lsass')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i "lsass')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i "lsass')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –i "lsass')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —i "lsass')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―i "lsass')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i lsass.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i lsass.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –i lsass.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —i lsass.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―i lsass.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('findstr "lsass')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('findstr lsass')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('findstr.exe "lsass')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('findstr.exe lsass'))))

output.summary: Detects findstring commands that include the keyword lsass, which indicates recon actviity for the LSASS process PID
